statements: DELETE FROM analytics_data WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM analytics_data WHERE event_type = 'click' AND event_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_profile WHERE age < 30 AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
DELETE FROM analytics_data WHERE event_time < '2022-01-01' AND event_value > 1000;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 50 AND customer_email = 'example@gmail.com';
DELETE FROM analytics_results WHERE result_value > 50 AND dataset_id = 10;
